i bought this game as i just wanted a bit of a casual boomer shooter to jump in and out of i was pleasantly surprised and this was just so much fun  your character is very versatile and one can upgrade him depending on your play style theres loads of weapons to choose from and the levels are well designed   the levels were massive and i was surprised that the three episodes were really lengthy and kept me busy for ages loved the whole cyber punk aesthetic as well   well recommended

until ultrakill leaves early access  this is the best boomer shooter since doom   turbo overkill consist of metal leg with chainsaw  metal arm with mini rockets double jump wall running turning your enemies into bloody mist slowtime grappling hook funny dialogues cool cutscenes   story that goes from deliver this to kill a god  lots of amazing weapons one of them lets you teleport into enemies  in short  must buy must play

now this is what old school shooter fans want high on action low on plot and when there is plot it doesnt slow the pace too much amazing game well worth a play

fast fun and surprisingly original  there are some great movement shooters out now but this one goes the extra mile to come up with some great new mechanics to set it apart the level variety is good and the vehicle segments and boss fights keep things feeling fresh the movement feels great and the weapons are pleasantly lethal though i do find it tempting to use the cheg for almost everything the story even delivers some nicely weighty twists and escalation throughout
absolutely worth it

great game well made lots of weapons upgrades augmentations etc various gimmicks are introduced across the campaign that keep the gameplay fresh and engaging  becomes trivially easy once you unlock the dual chainsaw and combine it with the extra damage you can just slide through everything  a little too busy in the visual department and maybe a touch too long i wanted it to be over by the 1012hr mark but its still a top recommendation either way
